name: Can it be delightful to design a table [Slides] - Config 2022
description:
Designing tables can be one of the most tedious processes that we interface designers can face... not only because it might not be a challenging process, but because we know that a developer could create and edit tables much faster than us, so, doesn't it miss the point of our work a little bit?

But having tables in prototypes is essential for many businesses and different types of users. Tons of tables need to be designed every day. Of course there are very good plugins out there that help a lot but in the end it is a very time and energy consuming task.

Well, this is the story of how Diego managed to overcome the frustration that working with tables used to produce, using the knowledge that is out there and putting into practice a way of working that now makes the process even fun.
